snippet.title: Luminous Plume - Release Trailer [PC]
snippet.description:
Set forth onto the battlefield in this new 2D action RPG inspired by the likes of Tales of, Ys, Valkyrie Profile, and other JRPG classics!


Release Date: November 5th, 2020
Platform: Steam, Others TBA


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1432480/Luminous_Plume/



---


Luminous Plume is a 2D action role-playing game set on the continent of Celis, a vast land inhabited by both humans and monster-like creatures called “brutes”.

Take control of the young swordsman Raven and clash against enemies in fast-paced, real-time action inspired by the likes of the Tales of and Ys series. Equipped with an arsenal of versatile combat techniques and special abilities, you’ll learn new skills as you grow stronger, collect mysterious artifacts that can alter your powers, and battle against a variety of enemies.


http://www.luminousplume.com
